author: Grace Tobin
title: 'We're hiring people by the day': Coronavirus means Australia's only medical mask factory is now operating around the clock
description: With medical masks in short supply, Australia's only mask factory is hoping to produce 50 million masks to support frontline medical staff in their battle against coronavirus.
content:
Posted March 27, 2020 08:43:59 The factory floor is frantic inside Australia's only medical mask manufacturing company. Key points:
  • Med-Con is the only factory in Australia still making medical masks
  • It is now trying to increase its produ… [+4784 chars]
